t: Amazon Relational Database Service - Wikipedia
s: December 12, 2024 - Amazon RDS was first released on 26 October 2009, supporting MySQL databases. This was followed by support for Oracle Database in June 2011, Microsoft SQL Server in May 2012, PostgreSQL in November 2013, and MariaDB (a fork of MySQL) in October 2015, and an additional 80 features during 2017.
